Class Bierka

  • java.lang.Object
    • szachy.Bierka
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Goniec, Hetman, Krol, Pionek, Skoczek, Wieza
    public abstract class Bierka
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract Piece class for basic piece functionality
